title: What is the best Pixel phone for cold weather/temperature?
content:
Hey, guys, I currently own a Pixel OG and really like it.  However in the winter, I frequently pull out my phone to take a picture and it will just shutdown.  I just want a Google phone so I don't care about which pixel it is.  

So what Pixel tolerate the cold best?

My experience so far with my Pixel OG:
The phone battery drop 30% when I am outdoor and the phone is "warm" in my winter coat.  The phone temperature is usually around 10C (50-60f).  When the phone is in my outside pocket it is usually around -10C (20f) it will just shutdown when I turn the screen on.

My old Motorola will be okay at -20c (close to 0F) so I still use it for winter runs and mountaineering.  Is there a Pixel that can do this?

Thanks in advance guys,

Thanh
